thread.title: Marvel’s Ironheart, Riri Williams, Gets a Fan Film From MIT for Pi Day
thread.title_full: Marvel’s Ironheart, Riri Williams, Gets a Fan Film From MIT for Pi Day

author: Dan Van Winkle
title: Marvel’s Ironheart, Riri Williams, Gets a Fan Film From MIT for Pi Day
text:
We could all use some inspiration right now, and this Riri Williams short from MIT really has us hyped up about the next generation of college students.
Today is “Pi Day” (3/14), and it’s also the day MIT admissions decisions will be released later on in the evening , so they decided to tease everyone last week with the release of this short film. Speaking of which, Robert Downey Jr./Tony Stark has been Iron Man for quite a while in Marvel movies. Maybe it’s getting to be time to give the next generation a chance there, as well? We certainly wouldn’t mind getting more Riri on the screen than just this short.
Good luck to everyone out there waiting to hear from MIT!
(image via screengrab)
